description:
As one of the leading personal injury practices in Pennsylvania, The Trapani Law Firm provides exceptional advocacy and support to those who have suffered an injury or lost a loved one as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Our law office in Allentown, Pennsylvania, is one of six in the state, lending testament to the level of success we have achieved helping our clients recover the full amount of compensation they deserve for the damages they incurred. Over the course of our history, we have secured millions of dollars in settlements and rewards for our plaintiff clients, earning our membership in the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates forums.

This level of success is the direct result of our extensive legal experience coupled with our unwavering dedication to those we serve, and our law firm's attorneys have earned recognition as being among the top trial attorneys in the country. In addition, our founder, attorney Matthew Trapani, recently co-authored a best-selling book on Amazon, so you can trust that we have the skills, knowledge and resources to handle your claim efficiently and help increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcome you expect.

Whether your legal challenge is the result of a motor vehicle accident, medical malpractice, dangerous property conditions, a defective product or any other preventable tragedy, you can contact The Trapani Law Firm by calling our office or visiting our website to schedule a free initial consultation.
